Function Reference¶

ellipsoid¶

hyperplane¶

hyperplane - Constructor of hyperplane object. double - Returns parameters of hyperplane, i.e. normal vector and

shift.

parameters - Same function as ‘double’ (legacy matter). dimension - Returns dimension of hyperplane. isempty - Checks if hyperplane is empty. isparallel - Checks if one hyperplane is parallel to the other one. contains - Check if hyperplane contains given point.

eq - Checks if two hyperplanes are equal. ne - The opposite of ‘eq’. uminus - Switches signs of normal and shift parameters to the opposite. display - Displays the details about given hyperplane object. plot - Plots hyperplane in 2D and 3D.
